item.description: City Of The Elves
About Bordered by a ravine. Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead? A vengeful paladin?
Churches Large Church to the Eldath in the center of a farming town Taverns The Boil and Youth Locations Badger Hill Cute little hillside with a taxidermy badger outside owner is Percival
AKA Malevolence Daria’s weapon. Usually surrounded by maddening mists of red.
“FORESTY”
Locations Tarvern of Forever Aeresia Cradle Elunore Ghost Indel Innadel Leradel Myts Ofheise Rauthei Stronghold Thyme Wastes
About Technological City. High poverty line contains slums. Large Lenses and cool locomotive carriage Leadership Minister Rabaniar the new leader of the Ministry of Information

About Gem of Aeresia Main market district of the continent Taverns The Golden Lion Posh Charity is the bartender They have coconut rum from Rauthei from a rabbit kin Events Ellianas was kidnapped by Granny Met Raffles the talking weasle
Organisations Brotherhood of the Resplendent Skin Cradle Snatchers Pussy Bandits The Joy Family The Syndicate Octopus Tattoo (Cathuwu) Order of the Blue Boar Granade Users Zentarum
Locations Ofheise in Naberus' lab Ghost Just outside of Myts
https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Eldath
About The face of The Syndicate AKA “The Lady of the long night” The puppet queen Mystress of Shadows Malice General Bad-bitch The Raven Queen(?
https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Lathander
Mardred Blutgard
About [[Breeze]]’s sister Suffering from a illness. Works as a painter/scullary maid for Minister Rabaniar
Adorable minotaur who was a guard at the Hopes Lament in the Thyme Wastes. He is mute as payment for running way from the prision.
About Dead like anus - Qidan
About Avatar of the god of magic. Located at Stronghold - Master of secrets. Has died and been ressurected. Events Killed by Rillathane Used to love Rillathane
About Mech from the mech releam former Pirate of the Astral Sea

About Vamipre kin from Bathumhold. Well know traders of trinkets and hard to find items Members Lucinda Du Pontif Nathanial Du Pontif Vampire Children (Annoying shits) Events Offered us a Ring of Misspelling
(8) Teenage fang has got a massive WANG (8) About Little Wolf kin / Fully grown wolfkin due to a time crystal and branching paths.
“Insemination in the Ranks” About Lead the attack on Ghost against The Marquis. Aggressive but pat-able
About Leader of a Hag coven of three (all bar one is dead name to be confirmed) Geralt of Rivania used to be a servant of Granny Dead
About DEAD - Badger Hill by Archibald BUT BUT BUT WHAT ABOUT THE MANNERISMS

About Member of The Syndicate Has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items like a monkey Events Trapped us at badger hill We have to sneakily get into her mansion Other Archibald has a connection to her (hit list?
About Member of The Syndicate Minotaur Lord of the Hylyllian Empire
About Unknown!
Yet to meet her she sounds like a bitch
About Our Quest Giver. Loves Corellien
About Prime minster of Myts Family Romanof - Looks like Ball Sack
About A talking skull met at Ghost now worn on winters belt “Evil in the sense that he is undead but not actually evil”
About Owner of Badger Hill Pug boy Caretaker of Griffins New member of the Stronghold

About Fey Creature - Adorable Appearance Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help Events Feyrealm an escort mission with a group of hedgehogs to a local village and defended them against some blink dogs.

About Met in the plane of insanity Had a dead cat, bat, camel and fish as a pet Dead Events Used a grande to kill a member of the royalty with in the plane of insantiy Documents came to light that Pigwings was a secret agent man (more clarity needed)
About Butler of the Stronghold usually accompained by the Pink Panther theme. Totally bad ass in combat.
About Mushoom being. Used to hang around corpses of dark rituals Best Friend of Qidan. Likely a stoner vision or imaginary friend.

About Dragonborn with the ability to invade and communicate through dreams. Member of the Brotherhood of the Resplendent Skin One of the organisations fighting The Syndicate I think this is a NPC but could be a new character
About I think they are dead lol
About Member of The Syndicate Avatar of Nature Dead - Killed by the Cradle Snatchers
About Lord of the Dark Elves. Dead Member of The Syndicate Events Caused a massive rift bringing deamons and nightmare fuel into Elunore when a vote for War on Cradle
About DEAD Member of The Syndicate Rackshasa Lich Hearsay Wolfkin Has a beak but not Arrakoa Can control animals Is a Rackshasa Resides with in the capital city of Ghost Vampires believe it is a Lich
About [[Fang]]’s Mother. Banged by Naberus
About Has a tattoo of a octopus with 8 guns on his butt Works for the Ministry of Information under Felis Flukneedle who is at the moment located at the northern garrison.
About Kenku Bard. Now works in the Tarvern of Forever
About MIA
About Killed by Granny
About A Orc Blood Hunter now Military Advisor for the Cradle Snatchers
About Hill Dwarf Barbarian. Asended to a god after a trail infront of the Dwarven Gods.
About MIA

About Class - Spore Druid From - Ofheise Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of Ofheise was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation.
About Little Fox boyo
About Home of the rabbit kin

Session 1 Innadel or Leradel Arrived at Innadel Met Breeze Went to the local tavern and question Breeze who was suspicious Archie notices guards outside the church Qidan scouts as a Bat We go and investigate FOR NO REASON EXCEPT NOSY Hostage situation Big fight Find letter with Black Seal with a monkey on From The Syndicate initiating the church into the fold Told to meet at Badger Hill Go to Badger Hill Get trapped by Lady Xiao CLIFFHANGER
Session 2 Badger Hill mages start filling the holes with CloudKill Rescue the hippogriffs and Percival
Session 3 Fang - used crystal, lasted for a week, but wolfkin had gone when he had got back Reigning lady of Mitts High tea society fleeing - covered in dust - to the south

Session 4 Questioning Murray Destroyer of Worlds Attacked by Zombie lake boys Daria turns into a red mist after nearly dying mainly to friendly fire “you are in my domain” - CROW AND RAT unsure if they are in the same voice A wall of flesh fight Met a Wolfkin fighting, he said he can lead us to The Matron Daria intimidated Rico who is a Wolfkin warrior Met General Howlington Older Fang has a big EGO and has headed to fight The Marquis against the General’s orders

Session 5 We are gonna attack Dark Haven and get fang back “by Gorm yes” We need to make a alliance with the Vampires in Bathumhold (The Du Pontif’s) to attack Dark Haven Old Wolf - Small Hovel, in Ellingville Quag, supply crates have gone missing which has health potions in Head to Bathumhold with Twink Wolfkin scout, no name needed he is too cute Travel through the tunnel Walrus fight.
Session 6 Questioning rico about the sniper It is from Ofheise (maybe there is a bang stick shop there?
Session 7 Dominus Oraculum number 3 came true Get a phoenix circlet Everyone wants to sell it I want it We get 30 Wolves We get 10 Vampire Total Cost 1.

Session 8 After the murder of Lady Xiao Daria Went back to the slums She monitored the local tarvern to see if any authorities come Barricades and blimps monitor the city of Myts The door of the tavern opens and closes Winter
Session 9 Go Back to breeze Attacked by Assassins which breeze suggested he should leave and he did. WE FORGOT THE NOTE the assassin left.
About The home of the Cradle Snatchers Members at the stronghold Percival Pink Panther Geralt of Rivania Corellien Merryweather Ratkin [[People/NPC/Cosine]] Creatures at the stronghold
A between releam bar which have connections to all parts of the multiverse.
About Desert Area containing a prison. Locations Hope’s Lament - Prison a member has put themselves into prison and we have to investigate why

item.description: List of Memes Sexy Ham. Illusion used by a legendary hedgehog bard to distract animals. “Does a x hit” - Used by Geralt of Rivania whenever he rolled a “2” and it came out as 30 to hit.

item.title: Session 10
item.description: Rave 1 v 1 (Daria Vs Romanof) Daria fucking owned Romanof She is so broken… Romanof says he will clear the West side of the wall at Sunset Melon Orgy The poet is melon inspired from the melon orgy and is writting sonnets and odes to melon.

item.title: Session 11
item.description: Session 11 Waking up in the desert RING RING its you Motorola Sending Stone Breeze and other have arrived and will be made to work for there keep Myts first regiment has been mobilised for Archi Plots many ways to kill them Using our Vampire and Werewolf army Taking over the prison and trap them Avoiding them all We still need to talk about this Talking about hopes lament Rumour of the woman in black arriving at the prison and taking over in a blink of a eye.

item.title: Session 12
item.description: In the Warden’s Office There has been a fight in ward 9 Guards are going to fight Asking about wings 4 wings but the prison should fit 3 We are guided by the warden through the prison All prison wings are in pocket dimension.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Strengthening Online Social Bonds: Research Garden Jacky Zhao’s Garden Anson Yu’s Garden Shihyu’s PKM Chloe’s Garden SlRvb’s Site Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory Brandon Boswell’s Garden If you want to see your own on here, submit a Pull Request adding yourself to this file!
